settings.subtitle: Pzaz is a breath spray with 180mg caffeine.

settings.text: Pzaz is made for on-the-go energy and refreshment.
Every spray leaves you with ultra fresh breath and a burst of caffeine energy.
This is your new pocket essential.

settings.title: It Really Works
settings.content: I love using this spray in the morning to help me wake up and get going. The taste is delicious and the caffeine and vitamins give me the energy I need to start my day off right.

settings.title: Working Very Well
settings.content: I love how I can throw it in my bag and get little boosts of energy throughout my day! Itâ€™s not too strong which is great for getting to that optimal caffeinated sweet spot. Plus not having to pee is kind of great.

settings.title: I LOVE THIS PRODUCT!!
settings.content: I love this product.  I get the caffeine hit basically right away but no jitters and it's not fucking with my stomach the way coffee does.  Also, it's so convenient to be able to just throw it in my pocket and have for whenever. Love.

settings.flavors-subheading: Caffeine and vitamins in a delicious, convenient, and controlled form factor.
